name: Follow the Lantern
description:
A (very short) visual novel game demo of Spirit Blossom Thresh! This demo was made when the skinline was first released in 2020.

I've gotten plenty of help from friends on this demo as well! Please check them out!

  • Alainey Lee: https://twitter.com/alainey_lee
  • gguokka: https://twitter.com/gguokka
  • MintyBunns: https://twitter.com/MintyBunns
  • Mir: https://twitter.com/mirrrchuchu
  • Linchi: https://twitter.com/Linchi_z
